GSSP Location: candidates are Mt. Crussol or Canjuers (SE France) and Fornazzo (Sicily, S. Italy)
Correlation Events: Near base of Hybonoticeras hybonotum ammonite zone and lowest occurrence of Gravesia genus, and the base of magnetic polarity Chron M22An

GSSP Location: candidate is Flodigarry (Isle of Skye, NW Scotland)
Correlation Events: Base of Subboreal ammonite Baylei Zone, Base of Densicostata Subzone marked by the base of the flodigarriensis horizon; Base of Boreal ammonite Bauhini Zone.

GSSP Location: candidates are Redcliff Point (Dorset, SW England) and Savouron (Provence, SE France)
Correlation Events:
Ammonite Cardioceras redcliffense Horizon at base of the Cardioceras scarburgense Subzone (Quenstedtoceras
            mariae Zone)

GSSP Location: candidates are Pfeffingen (Swabian Alb, SW Germany) and in Russia
Correlation Events: Ammonite FAD of the genus Kepplerites (Kosmoceratidae)             (defines base of Macrocephalites herveyi Zone in sub-Boreal province of Great Britain to southwest Germany)

GSSP Location: Ravin du Bès, Bas-Auran area, Alpes de Haute Provence, France
Correlation Events: Ammonite FAD Gonolkite convergens (defines base of Zigzagiceras zigzag Zone)
Ammonite FAD Hyperlioceras mundum, Hyperlioceras furcatum, Braunsina aspera, and Braunsina elegantula
Ammonite FAD Leioceras opalinum and Leioceras lineatum

Boundary Level: base of bed 15e (Couches de passage), uppermost Lemede Formation
Correlation Events:
FO of the ammonite D. (E.) simplex co-occurring with D.
            (E.) pseudocommune and D. (E.) polymorphum .

GSSP Location: Wine Haven, Robin Hood's Bay, Yorkshire Coast, England
Correlation Events: Ammonite association of Bifericeras donovani and Apoderoceras sp.

Boundary Level: 0.90 m above the base of Bed 145
Correlation Events: Ammonite FAD Vermiceras quantoxense, Vermiceras palmeri

Boundary Level: 5.80 m above top of Koessen Formation
Correlation Events: FO of ammonite Psiloceras spelae tirolicum, FO of aragonitic foraminifer Praegubkinella turgescens
